bio: Haj-Meer is this one's name, an Argonian wanderer who finds solace in the wilds of Skyrim's beauty. Born amidst the Hist's embrace in Black Marsh, the call of the untamed has forever echoed within my heart. In search of harmony with nature, I ventured to the north to these lands of Skyrim, where the towering trees, babbling brooks, and ancient mountains beckon with tales of exploration and connection. While the wilderness is my home, Riverwood, a small village nestled among the pines, becomes a place of necessity. There, I trade my hunted pelts and gathered herbs for the essentials needed to sustain my journey through this rugged province. More than once, I have ambushed unsuspecting bandits planning to raid Riverwood. Because of this the locals greet this one with kindness, an oddity for the often prejudiced Nords.
name: Haj-Meer
